name: MetroVision
description:
A get-to-the-subway-train puzzle game with an optical twist.

How to play:

  • Use the arrow keys to move the character towards the goal.
  • Arrow keys are scattered in the level.
  • You can only use the arrow keys that you have direct line of vision to.
  • Press the backspace key to undo any action.
